title: Manage Pipeline Pump Station Outage
description: A pump station on a major oil pipeline goes offline. A control room operator must adjust the remaining stations to minimize the impact on flow rate.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the 'Pump Station Offline' alarm for PS-04.
tasks.expected_outcome: The alarm is acknowledged, and the operator is aware of the situation.

tasks.description: Run a hydraulic simulation model to determine the impact of the outage on the pipeline's throughput.
tasks.expected_outcome: The model predicts a 20% reduction in flow rate if no action is taken.

tasks.description: Adjust the operating pressures of the upstream and downstream pump stations (PS-03 and PS-05) to compensate and recover as much flow as possible.
tasks.expected_outcome: The adjustments are made, and the model shows the flow rate is restored to 95% of the original rate.
